About.paragraph1: LinkUp Florida is a blockchain consulting group highly focused on accelerating smart contract adoption by connecting enterprise systems to distributed ledger technologies and developing innovative solutions for the Chainlink ecosystem. LinkUp leverages a cross-functional team of experts who are passionate about building out the Chainlink ecosystem and supporting the needs of the community as a whole.
About.paragraph2: Building a truly valuable smart contract requires the use of multiple inputs to prove contractual performance, as well as multiple outputs to affect outside systems and/or send payment to complete the smart contract. Chainlink provides your smart contract with the inputs and outputs it needs to reach its full potential.

Services.name: Nodes as a Service
Services.text: Don't know how to run a node? We'll handle all the technicals and manage a node for you.

Services.name: Staking Pools
Services.text: Stake with our pools to gain passive LINK without worrying about the complexities of running your own node.

Services.name: Enterprise Integeration
Services.text: We'll help your enterprise integrate Chainlink to monetize your data and provide essential infrastructure for your needs.

Services.name: External Adapters
Services.text: We'll build custom external adapters to suit your API or data endpoints.

Services.name: Consultation
Services.text: Don't understand Chainlink? Come to us and we can guide you through how it works.

Services.name: Educational Demos
Services.text: We can teach you how to use Chainlink in your smart contracts to connect them to external data.

Features.title: Educate
Features.text: Bringing the latest Chainlink innovation to our local community.  Education of this complex environment is critical to success.

Features.title: Advocate
Features.text: Active involvement in the Chainlink global community allows for our support and advocacy in our community.

Features.title: Connect
Features.text: Connecting community members from around the world to promote the use of universally connected smart contracts powered by Chainlink.

Features.title: Execute
Features.text: We work with companies and organizations to implement decentralized solutions using the Chainlink ecosystem.
